title: Pixel 3 display dead pixels and battery issue
content:
After about 14 months of my pixel 3, I saw dead pixels(green spots) on display. 
now its been 2 years since the purchase and all of a sudden device started rebooting continuously, this happened till the battery is completely drained. Did factory reset while kept charging and now the battery suddenly comes to zero from a full charge. the device is out of warranty now.

Completely disappointed by the quality of the hardware google is giving :(
I am considering switching to the iPhone.
